title: Belkin USB 3.0 Hub with 4 USB Ports - SuperSpeed USB Charging Station - USB Hub 3.0 - USB Adapter for iPhone Charger - USB Splitter - USB Port Hub - Powered USB Hub With Data Speeds Up To 5Gbps
features: EXPANDABLE CONNECTIVITY: Easily connect and disconnect up to four USB peripherals with a single SuperSpeed USB 3.0 cable
FAST TRANSFER SPEEDS: Supporting USB 3.0, and connecting via one SuperSpeed cable you can transfer data at speeds up to 5.0 Gbps
TRAVEL READY: With a slim and stylish design, you can bring this 4-port USB hub anywhere and conveniently expand the ports of your Mac or PC connecting to hard drives, flash drives, printers and more
QUICK CHARGE CONNECTED DEVICES - When connected to AC power each of the four powered USB A ports can offer robust power output for fast device charging
BROAD COMPATIBILITY: USB 3.0 hub & docking station works with Mac and PC, and is also backwards compatible with USB 2.0 devices
description: The Belkin USB 3.0 Hub with 4 powered USB ports is the perfect way to connect all your peripherals and quick charge your devices.

This USB 3.0 hub and docking station seamlessly connects to your Mac or PC with a single SuperSpeed USB-A cable, and expands the connectivity with 4 additional USB-A 3.0 ports. With its included AC power supply, this powered USB Hub is an ideal iPhone charger, and can output enough energy to support all your peripherals.

With its slim and light design this USB splitter will expand your home laptop or office computer with four USB 3.0 ports. This ideal USB hub for laptops will let you customize your desk setup to quickly connect your mouse, keyboard, portable hard drive, flash drive, printers, and more. And because it uses a SuperSpeed USB A cable, all four ports can transfer data at up to 5.0 Gbps.
This package includes USB 3.0 four-port Hub, SuperSpeed USB 3.0 Data Transfer Cable, and an AC power supply.
